    • convertObjectToTileSpace

      public boolean convertObjectToTileSpace
      Whether to convert the objects' pixel position and size to the equivalent in tile space.

    • flipY

      public boolean flipY
      Whether to flip all Y coordinates so that Y positive is down. All Arc renderers require flipped Y coordinates, and thus flipY set to true. This parameter is included for non-rendering related purposes of TMX files, or custom renderers.
